short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension Manager, conveniently manage your browser extensions
short.zh_CN: 插件管理器，方便管理你的浏览器插件
short.zh_TW: 擴充功能管理器，方便管理您的瀏覽器擴充功能

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"IExtension" is a browser extension that aims to provide users with more plugin management functions. It allows users to search, pin, visit the plugin homepage, enable/disable plugins, download CRX files, and configure management, etc. This makes it easier for users to organize and manage plugins in their browser.

If you encounter any problems during use, please don't panic. Negative reviews cannot solve the problem. You can provide feedback via the link below and I will follow up promptly.

👉 https://github.com/hocgin/feedback/issues 👈

If this has been helpful to you, can you please give me a good review? 🌹
long.zh_CN:
"IExtension" 是一款浏览器插件，旨在为用户提供更多的插件管理功能。它允许用户搜索、置顶、访问插件的主页、启用/禁用插件、下载 CRX 文件以及配置管理等。
这样可以更方便地组织和管理浏览器中的插件。

如果在使用过程中遇到问题，请不要着急，差评并不能解决问题。您可以在👇链接进行反馈，我会及时跟进的。
>>> https://github.com/hocgin/feedback/issues <<<
如果有帮助到你，可以给我一个好评吗🌹
